Text: AA telecom whitepaper Cc legal As per your requests attached is the Arthur Andersen Whitepaper on Accounting by Telecommunications providers Ive highlighted some of the pertinent sections in yellow Any questions please give me a call Jesse Morris EBS Transaction Support Phone Cell Fax Email

RE sizes for adopted childthanks Jesse Morris EBS Transaction Support Phone Cell Fax Email Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Monday November AM To Morris Jesse Subject RE sizes for adopted child Ill look at other sizes kids in her grade and call you back kh Original Message From Morris Jesse Sent Friday November AM To Hyatt Kevin Subject sizes for adopted child Kevin Sorry to be a pest about this but my wife is being insistent that we are off base on the sizes My adopted child is years old and she is listing sizes of shirt pants and shoes My wife says that she buys clothes for our nieces one of which is six years old and wears a size and shoe size Our adopted child is two years younger and asking for the same size in clothes and asking for shoe size I dont want to be a pest but my wife is concerned on the sizes and we dont want to goof up when we give the clothes to Rocio Is there a way to see what other year olds are asking for in sizes Jesse Morris EBS Transaction Support Phone Cell Fax Email
